001package org.nasdanika.common;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.List;
007
008public class ListCompoundFunction<T,R> extends ListCompoundExecutionParticipant<Function<? super T, ? extends R>> implements Function<T,List<R>>  {
009
010        @SafeVarargs
011        public ListCompoundFunction(String name, Function<? super T, ? extends R>... functions) {
012                this(name, Arrays.asList(functions));
013        }
014        
015        public ListCompoundFunction(String name, Collection<Function<? super T, ? extends R>> functions) {
016                super(name);
017                for (Function<? super T, ? extends R> function: functions) {
018                        add(function);
019                }
020        }       
021
022        @Override
023        public List<R> execute(T arg, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
024                progressMonitor.setWorkRemaining(size());
025                List<R> result = new ArrayList<>();
026                for (Function<? super T, ? extends R> e: getElements()) {
027                        result.add(e == null ? null : e.splitAndExecute(arg, progressMonitor));                 
028                }
029                return result;
030        }       
031
032}
